title: Bel Fuse reports 1 2  Y Y increase in 4Q17 sales  backlog orders of  146 5M
content: Bel Fuse BELFA BELFB expects 4Q17 total sales of  120M   1 2  Y Y  taking FY17 total sales to  492M against  500M in 2016 Backlog orders of  146 5M at the year end up from   113 2M at Dec  31  2016 Press ReleaseNow read

title: U S  stocks higher at close of trade  Dow Jones Industrial Average up 1 13
content:
Investing com   U S  stocks were higher after the close on Wednesday  as gains in the Oil   Gas  Financials and Technology sectors led shares higher 
At the close in NYSE  the Dow Jones Industrial Average added 1 13  to hit a new 3 months high  while the S P 500 index climbed 1 18   and the NASDAQ Composite index added 1 30  
The best performers of the session on the Dow Jones Industrial Average were Apple Inc  O AAPL   which rose 4 13  or 4 73 points to trade at 119 28 at the close  Meanwhile  Merck   Company Inc  N MRK  added 3 05  or 1 63 points to end at 55 10 and JPMorgan Chase   Co  N JPM  was up 2 92  or 1 86 points to 65 50 in late trade 
The worst performers of the session were Procter   Gamble Company  N PG   which fell 1 01  or 0 78 points to trade at 76 51 at the close   Home Depot  Inc  N HD  declined 0 52  or 0 65 points to end at 123 82 and Boeing Company  N BA  was down 0 39  or 0 58 points to 147 88 
The top performers on the S P 500 were Genworth Financial Inc  N GNW  which rose 10 25  to 5 27  L 3 Communications Holdings Inc  N LLL  which was up 9 64  to settle at 125 59 and Boston Scientific Corporation  N BSX  which gained 9 39  to close at 18 40 
The worst performers were  Akamai Technologies Inc   O AKAM  which was down 16 73  to 62 91 in late trade  Walgreens Boots Alliance Inc  O WBA  which lost 10 73  to settle at 84 95 and  Verisk Analytics Inc   O VRSK  which was down 9 55  to 72 66 at the close 
The top performers on the NASDAQ Composite were  Great Basin Scientific Inc   O GBSN  which rose 37 14  to 0 0720   Jaguar Animal Health  Inc  O JAGX  which was up 32 85  to settle at 2 75 and  Fusion Tele   O FSNN  which gained 29 38  to close at 2 73 
The worst performers were  Macrocure Ltd   O MCUR  which was down 61 27  to 1 65 in late trade  Escalera Resources Co  O ESCR  which lost 31 15  to settle at 0 040 and Bel Fuse B Inc  O BELFB  which was down 22 46  to 17 78 at the close 
Rising stocks outnumbered declining ones on the New York Stock Exchange by 2031 to 501 and 2 ended unchanged  on the Nasdaq Stock Exchange  2068 rose and 510 declined  while 40 ended unchanged 
Shares in Macrocure Ltd  O MCUR  fell to all time lows  down 61 27  or 2 61 to 1 65  Shares in Escalera Resources Co  O ESCR  fell to all time lows  down 31 15  or 0 018 to 0 040  
The CBOE Volatility Index  which measures the implied volatility of S P 500 options  was down 7 19  to 14 32 a new 1 month low 
Gold for December delivery was down 0 80  or 9 30 to  1156 50 a troy ounce  Elsewhere in commodities trading  Crude oil for delivery in December rose 6 92  or 2 99 to hit  46 19 a barrel  while the December Brent oil contract rose 5 10  or 2 38 to trade at  49 20 a barrel 
EUR USD was down 1 10  to 1 0924  while USD JPY rose 0 46  to 121 01 
The US Dollar Index was up 0 69  at 97 69
